mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (iuser, title, ctnt) value ( #{iuser}, #{title}, #{ctnt})
mapper.select: SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.created_at createdAt, B.nm writer, B.main_pic writerMainPic from t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser ORDER BY iboard DESC LIMIT ${startIdx}, ${rowLen}
SELECT A.iboard, A.title, A.ctnt, B.nm writer, A.created_at, A.updated_at, B.main_pic FROM t_board A INNER JOIN t_user B ON A.iuser = B.iuser WHERE iboard = ${iboard}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE iuser = ${iuser} AND iboard = ${iboard}
